mapper.select: -- 查询用户拥有设备的设备物模型 SELECT * from lm_device_model as dm INNER JOIN lm_user_owner_device as uod -- 通过查询中间表来过滤不属于该用户id的设备 where uod.user_id = #{uid} and -- 查询出中间表的设备id dm.sn = #{sn} and -- 查询设备sn uod.device_id = dm.device_id -- 如果中间表的设备等于物模型表的设备
SELECT count(1) FROM lm_device_model WHERE to_days(create_time) = to_days(now());
